ABOUT_ME.FIRSTLY: I'm an experienced Software Developer with skills in frontend and backend development, I've spent the last 10 years improving my abilities. I love solving challenging problems creating tools that make life easier for people.
ABOUT_ME.SECONDLY: Furthermore, I'm a Computer Systems Engineer, experienced with software engineering projects under PMI and SCRUM methodologies. very committed to the duties that correspond to me, of excellent character and teamwork without problems, I stand out in the development of web applications (Fullstack Developer) with solid knowledge in different technologies that I have known throughout my career.
